attributes.action: Ban any discriminatory form of covid vaccine-based certification system
attributes.background: We ask the government to outlaw any form of discrimination against those individuals who cannot, shouldn't or choose not to be vaccinated against covid-19, including any form of covid-status checks, such as covid passports or certificates.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for a similar action: 

Outlaw discrimination on the basis of vaccination status:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596004

Do not mandate a vaccine passport for international travel to or from the UK.:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581401

Do not require a Covid passport for access to any services, jobs or events:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593122
